sentences.sContent: Chosen carefully, the oils may not only palliate but also cure the condition.
sentences.sCn: 如果仔细挑选，挑到的精油不仅可以缓和症状，还可以治愈疾病。

remMethod.val: pall (罩子) + iate → 戴上氧气罩， 减轻呼吸困难 → 减轻

words.tran: 缓和的；掩饰的；可斟酌的
辩解；缓和剂；暂时姑息的手段

trans.tranOther: to reduce the effects of illness, pain etc without curing them
